parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Fades in mission screen and re-executes <tt>init.sqf</tt> and <tt>init.sqs</tt> scripts. In [[Eden Editor]] the code inside the "Init" mission attribute is executed.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''runInitScript'''

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[runInitScript]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Event Scripts]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
